content: see https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/233931-t-compiler.2Fmajor-changes/topic/.60mv.20src.2Flib.7Bstd.2Ccore.2Calloc.2Ctest.2Cetc.7D.20std.2Fl.20compiler-team.23298 for more details, and probably reply there, but the compiler team is currently considering a proposal to move the standard library (and related libraries) sources into a separate top-level directory to make it easier for new contributors to see "what std is" and such.
